name: ASTRO'S SPACE ADVENTURE
description:
-a/s/d/w to move-e to interact-f for fullscreen-

 build your ship with scrap metal and escape with your ship!

-------------------story------------------

you, your friend/co-worker Zaiden and your boss Auryn are in a mission to go to earth after a human rover came to your planet with animal and grass DNA to experiment on it. with it came quordinates to earth.you later find yourself crashing in a meteor just outside their solar system.you go to one of three escape pods with the dna's.
